item.title: Eat - o - pia
item.description: Type of Project Tags Academic Game Design, Interaction Design Guide Tools used Prof. Uday Athavankar Unity, Photoshop, Illustrator, Colors and Paper Eat-o-pia is a 4-player hybrid or Phy-gital game. This was an exploratory project, created as a tool to help kids understand Foodchain. The aim of this game was to show the relationship between different animals, and their relationship with food.
